title: Hoops Tonight - Warriors Preseason Reaction + NBA Power Rankings: Will Steph Curry, Draymond Green & Warriors repeat?
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight - Warriors Preseason Reaction + NBA Power Rankings: Will Steph Curry, Draymond Green & Warriors repeat?
description:
Jason Timpf reacts to Stephen Curry and the Golden State Warriors' 96-87 preseason victory over Bradley Beal and the Washington Wizards. Jason shares his thoughts on the Warriors' poor shooting, elite defense, and how players like Moses Moody, Jonathan Kuminga, and James Wiseman will step up this season with Gary Payton II and Otto Porter Jr. gone. Plus, Jason breaks down the Golden State Warriors ahead of the 2022-2023 NBA season. Has another playoff run taken its toll on this aging Warriors core of Steph Curry, Draymond Green, and Klay Thompson? How will the Warriors integrate Jonathan Kuminga and James Wiseman into their rotation? What do the Warriors need to do to repeat as NBA champions? #Volume #herd #colincowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
